title: Black Panther
reviewComment: Black Panther is a groundbreaking superhero film with stunning visuals, compelling characters, and a powerful cultural impact.

title: Captain Marvel
reviewComment: Captain Marvel offers a thrilling origin story with strong performances, stunning visuals, and an empowering message, despite some predictable plot points.

title: Iron man 2
reviewComment: Iron Man 2 delivers action-packed sequences and charismatic performances, but its crowded plot weakens the overall impact.

title: Captain America winter soldier
reviewComment: Captain America: The Winter Soldieris a thrilling blend of action, espionage, and character development, redefining superhero movies with its depth.

title: Captain America civil war
reviewComment: Captain America: Civil War delivers thrilling action, deep character conflicts, and a compelling narrative, making it a must-watch superhero film.

title: Spiderman homecoming
reviewComment: Spider-Man: Homecoming is a refreshing, fun take on the iconic hero, blending high school struggles with thrilling superhero action seamlessly.
